problem_text_cn: 如图,直线PA、PB是⊙O的两条切线,A、B分别为切点,若∠APB=120°,⊙O的半径为10,则弦AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight lines PA and PB are the two tangents of ⊙O. If ∠APB = N_0, the radius of ⊙O is N_1, then the length of chord AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:连OA,OB,∵直线PA,PB是⊙O的两条切线,∴OA⊥PA,OB⊥PB,∴∠OAP=∠OBP=90°∵∠APB=120°,∠OAP+∠OBP+∠APB+∠AOB=360°,∴∠AOB=60°,∵OA=OB,∴△AOB为等边三角形,∴AB=OA=10,故选:B．
